air:Brand.Name: Economy Saver
air:Brand.air:Title: Economy Saver
EcoSaver
air:Brand.air:Text:
Included in your ECONOMY SAVER fare are:
• Check in 25kg baggage allowance. • Carry on one bag max 8kg. • Choice of continental or Indian cuisine non veg or veg. • Complimentary liquors and wine. • Spacious seats with a pitch of 33 inches. • Rebooking against a fee until 24hrs prior departure. • Refunds against a fee until 24hrs prior departure. • Earn miles when you fly.
Note: Refer to fare rules for specific booking terms and conditions. • Please note that if the flight is operated by another airline then the onboard product or service maybe different to that described above.
